summary: This document contains information regarding the Southern Financial Group and its involvement in SEC violations, including insider trading and securities fraud. It details a court ruling that found defendants, including Tracy Calvin Dunlap, Jr., in contempt of court for failing to comply with orders related to document production and repatriation of investor funds.

persons.name: Tracy Calvin Dunlap, Jr.
persons.context: Tracy Calvin Dunlap, Jr. is mentioned as a defendant in a court case regarding contempt of court for failing to produce documents and repatriate investor funds.

events.title: Court Ruling on Contempt
events.description: The court adjudged defendants, including Tracy Calvin Dunlap, Jr., to be in contempt of court and ordered incarceration due to their refusal to obey court orders.

keyFacts: The Southern Financial Group was involved in SEC violations including insider trading and securities fraud.
The court found Tracy Calvin Dunlap, Jr. and others in contempt for not complying with court orders.
Dunlap was ordered to be incarcerated as a result of the contempt ruling.
